walledtemplates.settings.default-to-wall: If set, newly-created templates will default to being walled. Each template configuration has a toggle to turn walled on/off.
walledtemplates.settings.autotarget-menu: When toggle option is selected, a bullseye control button in the template control bar will allow you to switch between targeting or not targeting.
walledtemplates.settings.autotarget-meth: Method to auto-target tokens with templates
walledtemplates.settings.autotarget-area: For overlap autotarget method only. The percent of the token area that must overlap the template to count as a target. 0 means any overlap counts.
